Cameron Todd Willingham /// Part 2 /// 353

www.TrueCrimeGarage.com J

ust days before Christmas a horrible house fire claimed the lives of three very innocent victims. Later fire inspectors determined that the fire was set. Someone was responsible for the fire and for the murder of three. Join us in the garage as we discuss one of the most controversial cases from Texas.
